column3: Request for Erasure (Right to be Forgotten)
column13: Request to delete all personal data after tenant account closure
column14: RDS database (user records in tenant_123 schema), S3 bucket (multi-tenant-app-tenant-123), Backup vault (recovery points)
column15: Verified customer (tenant controller) approved erasure; deleted user records from RDS; deleted user documents from S3 bucket; CloudTrail logs pseudonymized (user_id hashed; retained for audit - legitimate interests override); backup recovery points will expire per retention (30d/365d) - documented
column24: GDPR Article 17 erasure; CloudTrail logs retained but pseudonymized; confirmed deletion to data subject; backup expiry documented

column8: Company verification (website email match) + authorized signatory

column14: RDS database (complete tenant_456 schema ~50k records), S3 bucket (multi-tenant-app-tenant-456 ~5GB files)
column15: Database export: mysqldump to JSON (all tenant tables); S3 export: zip archive of all objects with metadata; provided via secure S3 presigned URL (7-day expiry); included schema documentation and data dictionary
column24: Large dataset; extension granted and communicated; customer satisfied with export format; migration successful per customer feedback

column8: Email verification (link sent to email address)
column13: Object to marketing emails and data processing for marketing purposes
column15: Immediately removed from all marketing lists; unsubscribe processed; consent withdrawn; future communications: Transactional only (if becomes customer); retained record of objection (compliance purposes - legitimate interests)
column24: GDPR Article 21 objection; absolute right to object to direct marketing; immediate processing (same day); objection record retained to prevent re-adding
